did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes course outlines; report and memoranda of the National Architectural Accrediting Board, memoranda of the Curriculum Committee and the Academic Policy Committee of the Cornell Department of Architecture; correspondence, memoranda, reports and other records concerning the teaching of landscape architecture.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Oswald Mathias Ungers, born 1926; professor of architecture, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes course outlines; report and memoranda of the National Architectural Accrediting Board, memoranda of the Curriculum Committee and the Academic Policy Committee of the Cornell Department of Architecture; correspondence, memoranda, reports and other records concerning the teaching of landscape architecture; materials on architecture curriculum; materials concerning the structure of the Department of Architecture; and other papers reflecting Ungers' career as a professor of architecture at Cornell University.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. College of Architecture, Art, and Planning.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Oswald Mathias Ungers. Papers, #15-2-2035. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of two boxes. Online guide unavailable.
